title: GAME FEATURES
subtitle: Discover what makes this RPG by Toby Fox an unforgettable deltarune online experience

points.adventure: Unique Dark World adventure with Kris, Susie, and Ralsei
points.storytelling: Toby Fox's masterful storytelling and character development
points.music: Memorable music that enhances every emotional moment
points.free: Free-to-play episodic releases with expanding lore

combat.title: Strategic Combat System
combat.description: Experience innovative turn-based combat with bullet-hell mechanics. Control Kris, Susie, and Ralsei in strategic team battles.

story.title: Compelling Story
story.description: Immerse yourself in a captivating narrative by Toby Fox. Follow the heroes through the Dark World in this episodic RPG adventure.

music.title: Amazing Soundtrack
music.description: Enjoy an acclaimed musical score that perfectly complements your Dark World adventure experience.

chapters.title: Multiple Chapters
chapters.description: Explore unique Dark World environments with character development across expanding story chapters.

online.title: Play Online Free
online.description: Play deltarune online directly in your browser. Experience the full free deltarune adventure on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.

save.title: Auto-Save Progress
save.description: Your progress is automatically saved. Continue your Dark World adventure anytime without losing progress.
